Name: Poco In
About the game: Let's guide Poco-chan to the goal! This game is a simple maze game. Remove objects with a revolver. Concept of this game It is designed so that you can enjoy it to kill some time. Features of the game 5 levels in total. The maze gradually widens. Objects can be destroyed by a revolver. The game is more of a 'to be able to shoot and destroy objects' maze than a shooter. No music. You can freely distribute videos of this game . Controls W, A, S, D: Move. E: Draw(or put into holster) a revolver. Left click: Shoot a revolver. Right Click: Aim target with a revolver. ESC: Pause screen. Options: Press ESC on the main menu. The top indicator shows the goal. The default is 1280 * 720 resolution and window mode. Press ESC on the main menu to display the options. To clear the options screen, press ESC again. There are no plans to implement STEAM achievements, XBOX controller support, free DLCs, etc. This game is only available to STEAM players. (I will not distribute this game outside STEAM.)
